attributes.action: dissolve parliament and call a General Election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The trust that the people of the United Kingdom have placed in parliament has been seriously dented by the expenses scandal. A General Election is now the only way that true democracy and trust in our public servants can be reinstated. Whilst many public services are suffering the politicians are feathering their nests!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
